page.title: 04THE SCHOOL
page.content: The old school opened in 1877 and closed in 1959,when it was changed into a house for the school teacher.The new school is about 1 mile away from the old school where Mrs Cochrane now lives. There are 15 pupils in Dalavich Primary School.In 1957 there were about 50, and two years ago there were 26. Mr Stewart has been driving the school car for 19 years.He used to take 10 people but now he only takes 4 people to and from school. He has lived in Dalavich 34 years and his house is about 30 years old. There has been a shop in Dalavich ever since Dalavich was built in 1952.
